Message.ShortMessage: Ignoring exceptional return value of method
Message.LongMessage: The return value of a method that returns a mutable object is being ignored. It should be checked to ensure that the object is not modified in unexpected ways.

Message.ShortMessage: Result of integer multiplication cast to long
Message.LongMessage: This code casts the result of multiplying two integers to a long. The resulting value is likely to be incorrect because the multiplication is done in 32-bit arithmetic before the cast.
